Chutney Recipes, Dosa Recipes links are shared at the end of this post ðŸ™‚ Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and Procedure Ingredients: ( Brown Rice Dosa Batter ) 1 cup = 160 ml
  • Brown Rice - 2 cups
  • Regular rice - 1 cup
  • Skinless Split black lentils/ urad dal - 1 cup
  • Sabudana/ tapioca pearls - 1/2 cup
  • Methi/ fenugreek seeds - 1 tsp
  • Puffed rice - 2 cups - (soaked in water for 10 mins and wash twice)
  • Salt - 3 tsp
  • Baking soda - 1/4 tsp
Procedure: Brown rice Dosa batter:
  • Add brown rice, regular rice, urad dal, Sabudana, Methi seeds in a large mixing bowl
  • Wash two to three times under running water
  • Drain water and add fresh water in it, let them soak for 7 hours
  • Each grain soaked perfectly, drain water
  • Now add soaked Puffed rice in mixing bowl and combine everything
  • Next grind them to a fine paste,Â You can use grinder or mixer to make batter. Add water in portions to make smooth Dosa batter
  • Takeout batter in a large pot, add salt and baking soda. Mix well
  • Let the batter rest for 12-15 hours (it varies depends on weather conditions). Keep it in a warm place
  • Batter raised, fermented well and make dosaâ€™s as shown below in pictures or follow below steps
Brown rice Masala Dosa:
  • Heat Dosa pan over medium heat
  • Sprinkle water and wipe off with paper towel
  • Now, Pour one ladle Dosa batter and rotate circular shape at the center with the help of ladle
  • Apply oil or ghee
  • Turn Dosa when it turns light brown, cook other side as well
